name: Cold Horror
description:
Our story is set in a cold wintery world, where our nameless protagonist has just finished gathering some firewood. She is on her way back to the cabin she and her friends are currently living in, when things take an unexpected and rather horrifying turn for the worse.

Control your and your friend's destiny with the choices you make, and uncover the mystery haunting these woods. What happened? Who is responsible? And most importantly... will you survive?

Writers:

  • birk.lerviks
  • Bardia Eghbali
  • esewese
  • Minskuju
  • Jintastic
